Dishwasher Repair Services

If your dishwasher broke down, a pile of dirty plates keeps growing and won’t let you rest. Don’t deal with it, especially when you can trust fixing it to pros.

Dishwashers literally save your time and energy – there are so many things you can do instead of washing dishes! Alas, sometimes they break down or run poorly. AC/DC Appliance Repair is always there for you in case of trouble! We repair all types of problems. Rely on our experts, they’ll identify the cause of malfunction and fix your unit quickly. On top of that. we offer preventative or routine dishwasher maintenance to make your appliance live longer.

Dishwasher repair price range

The cost of repairing a dishwasher is $125 to $350. Obviously, fixing something small like a valve or filter is worth less than replacing the motor or pump. This appliance also runs the risk of water leaks, so you need to watch out for:

Typical problems

  • Leaks around the dishwasher
  • Water that won’t drain
  • Lack of heat

Did you notice any of these? Then don’t hesitate to call us!

Dishwasher brands we repair

  • Amana
  • Bosch
  • Electrolux
  • Frigidaire
  • GE
  • JennAir
  • Kenmore
  • KitchenAid
  • LG
  • Maytag

No matter what brand of dishwasher you possess, they all work on similar principles. Hand your dishwasher over to our technically competent personnel and book your repair online today.

Our advantages

The cost of regular appliance diagnostics is $60

Calling a professional repairman costs from $60. This is a fixed price, it includes master’s cost of travel and time spent inspecting your appliance.

Use our service for repair and get free diagnostics

We know the value of money that’s why we decided to make a free estimate for everyone who decides to repair their appliances at AC/DC HVAC & Appliance repair. You may rest assured, you won’t have to put in a penny for our in-home consultation. We favour customer-oriented, after all!

6-month guarantee

We provide 6-month guarantee that covers all parts and details changed by our service. Also, we give one-year extended warranty for repaired refrigerators and HVAC systems.

Same-day, everyday service

We at AC/DC HVAC & Appliance Repair value our and our clients’ time. Call us and be sure to meet our master later on the same day. Our working hours are 8 a.m to 8 p.m. seven days a week.
